body:
This PR supports the following:

- changes smoke/install tests to catch and log `SyntaxError` failures;
- adds tests for new routines; and
- ensures existing test command tests use the mock test stage (to avoid "polluting" the standard test stage directory.

This PR has been tested manually using Python 2 *and* Python3 on the `m4` package with and without a syntax error.
title: Smoke tests: harden smoke tests to package syntax errors
